attributes.action: We, the undersigned, do not want the UK to leave the EU.
attributes.additional_details: At least, a second EU Referendum must be held. We believe the result will be totally different. EU Article 50 must not yet be invoked. More time is needed for the clouds of confusion to clear. Nothing must be written in stone, yet!
attributes.background: We believe the recent EU Referendum does not adequately represent the true nature of the needs of the people of the UK. Too much misleading and irrelevant information, involving hatred and fear, was involved. Too many people say they wouldn't have voted to leave the EU if it actually meant leaving.
